list_definition.definition: to cut into small pieces or chop finely

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: Would you like me to mince the meat for you?

list_definition.definition: to walk with short steps, in an unpleasantly dainty or delicate way
meat (usually beef) chopped up into small pieces
